name: Yushutian Coal Mine
company_mentions: Xinjiang Kuche County Xia Kuotan Mining Development Company

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Yushutian Coal Mine is an underground coal mine with a production capacity of 900,000 tons per year

operators: Xinjiang Kuche County Xia Kuotan Mining Development Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Xinjiang Kuche County Xia Kuotan Mining Development Company, which is a joint venture with Xuzhou Mining Group (70%) and Datong Shuangjian Industrial Company (30%).
